query:
SELECT 
  hierarchyLevel,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN userId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as com_usuario,
  SUM(CASE WHEN userId IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as sem_usuario
FROM employees 
WHERE active = 1 
AND hierarchyLevel IN ('diretoria', 'gerencia', 'coordenacao', 'supervisao')
GROUP BY hierarchyLevel
ORDER BY 
  CASE hierarchyLevel 
    WHEN 'diretoria' THEN 1 
    WHEN 'gerencia' THEN 2 
    WHEN 'coordenacao' THEN 3 
    WHEN 'supervisao' THEN 4 
  END;

  hierarchyLevel,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN userId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as com_usuario,
  SUM(CASE WHEN userId IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as sem_usuario
FROM employees 
WHERE active = 1 
AND hierarchyLevel IN ('diretoria', 'gerencia', 'coordenacao', 'supervisao')
GROUP BY hierarchyLevel
ORDER BY 
  CASE hierarchyLevel 
    WHEN 'diretoria' THEN 1 
    WHEN 'gerencia' THEN 2 
    WHEN 'coordenacao' THEN 3 
    WHEN 'supervisao' THEN 4
